segments.text: Ladies and gentlemen . It's about time to land in New York . Here are a couple of forms for you to fill out .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What forms must we fill out , Miss ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are E / D cards . All passengers except American citizens must complete these forms .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . But why do we have to fill out these forms now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It will save you much time when you clear customs .
segments.speaker: S1
